author: jitendra
msg: HIVE-6708 : ConstantVectorExpression should create copies of data objects rather than referencing them. (Hari Subramaniyan via jitendra)

author: markt
msg: Fix custom UTF-8 decoder so that a byte of value 0xC1 is always rejected immediately as it is never valid in a UTF-8 byte sequence. Update UTF-8 decoder tests to account for UTF-8 decoding improvements in Java 8.
The custom UTF-8 decoder is still required due to bugs in the UTF-8 decoder provided by Java. Java 8's decoder is better than Java 7's but it is still buggy.
